instruction.description: A little instruction on how to get an API key.

step1.description: Click here to join the Discord server.
step1.title: Go Discord server.

step2.description: Complete the captcha on the #Verify channel to verify your user.
step2.title: Verify Your User.

step3.description: Locate the #Get-a-key channel in the Discord server and go to it.
step3.title: Go to Channel.

step4.description: Click on the "Generate" button to fill out the key generation form.
step4.title: Click Generate.

step5.description: Select "Valorant" in the list of games.
step5.title: Select Valorant.

step7.description: Fill out the form. In the product name, enter "Valorant overlay", in the product description, enter "Overlay to show rank on stream", then click "Send".
step7.title: Fill the form.

step8.description: You will receive your API key on your Discord DMs.
step8.title: Open the DM.

step9.description: Use the generated key on the overlay page.
step9.title: Copy the API key and use it.

instruction.title: Hendrik's API

features.subtitle:
Packed with powerful tools, our app makes it effortless to display and
customize your Valorant stats. From seamless setup to full
personalization, we've got everything to make your stream shine.
features.title: Everything You Need to Elevate Your Stream

left.description: Track Your Game, Own the Stream

 to adjust the position.
drag.title:

Please enter your profile to see it.

features.first:
Customize your overlay according
to your stream.

It's absolutely free!
There is support for many popular
streaming programs like OBS and others.
features.third:
Configure once, enjoy seamless
operation forever!

with real-time Valorant stats!

Our application's source code is fully accessible on GitHub.
We welcome everyone to view, utilize, and contribute to its development.

streamers.subtitle:
Top Valorant streamers already showcase their stats with our app.
